intro: Oreocharis zhenpingensis, commonly known as the Zhenping oreocharis, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Orchidaceae family and is characterized by its unique, delicate flowers. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions with cool, moist conditions. Its leaves are usually basal, and it produces small, fragrant blooms. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
